key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities, including shortages of critical materials and rising costs
Competitive pressures from low-cost manufacturers, particularly in China
Dependence on key geographic markets, making the company susceptible to regional regulatory changes or economic downturns
Post-spin-off challenges in establishing brand identity and operational independence
controversies: Patent dispute with Tongwei Solar, now resolved through a global settlement and cross-licensing agreement
Significant short interest from hedge funds, reflecting concerns about financial health and industry challenges
environmental_issues: None explicitly identified; company emphasizes sustainability and resource-efficient manufacturing
social_issues: None explicitly identified; company promotes sustainability and environmentally responsible practices
governance_issues: Post-spin-off challenges in managing legacy dependencies and establishing operational independence
